steps.name: User launches the browser and navigate to home panel
User should verify that the home page is visible

elements.name: Search Products and Verify Cart After Login # TC 20

steps.name: User clicks the "Products" button in home header
User should be navigated to ALL PRODUCT page
User enters a product name in the search input and clicks the search button
User should see "SEARCHED PRODUCTS" text shown
User should verify that all products related to the search are visible there
User adds the searched products to the cart by hover
User clicks the "Cart" button by hover
User should verify that searched products are visible inside cart
User clicks "Signup / Login" button from cart page
User enters login details from config and clicks the "Login" option
User clicks the "Cart" button in home page again after login
User should verify that searched products are still visible in the cart
User removes all products from the cart by clicking X
User should see "Cart is empty! Click here to buy products." confirmation shown

arguments.val: "Cart is empty! Click here to buy products."

steps.name: User launches the browser and navigate to home panel
User should verify that the home page is visible
User should verify that categories are visible on the left sidebar
User clicks on "Women" category
User clicks on "Dress" sub-category under Women category

steps.name: User should verify that brands are visible on the left sidebar
User clicks on "Polo" brand
User should verify that user is navigated to "POLO PRODUCTS" brand page
User clicks on "H&M" brand next
User should verify that user is navigated to the "H&M PRODUCTS" brand page
